about_the_game:
First and foremost, we want to make it clear that since we’re in Early Access, we believe it would be wrong to cut content from the main game to sell separately. That’s why everything in the Supporter Pack is just a small token of our appreciation for you with some unique cosmetics.

The game will continue to receive regular updates throughout Early Access. If, at any point, you find yourself loving our game so much that you want to show extra support, this pack is here for that. For those who do pick up this pack alongside the game, we just want to say thank you for your trust. We won’t let any of you down!

Now, let’s take a look at what’s inside the pack:

ADDITIONAL MAIN MENU BACKGROUND


In addition to the standard background, you’ll occasionally see an alternative view from the control room when entering the main menu.

ALTERNATIVE DRILL CORE BAR SKIN


The bar will now serve the best drinks in all of Eos—at least according to the bartenders. We still know the drinks supplier hasn’t changed though…

GO OUT WITH A BANG


Once per contract, if your core’s health drops below 15%, the Hungry Couch ship will drop a fireworks crate. Use it to boost your crew’s morale during tough times! They probably won’t see it from the depths of the mine, but it’ll cheer you up — and isn’t that what Platform Manager benefits are for?
